title: Speeder In Arizona Thankful He Wasn't Caught Going Faster
teaser: Police in Phoenix say Alejandro Barraza was driving 131 miles per hour â€” fast enough to go to jail. As he was led away, police say Barraza said he felt lucky that he wasn't caught at 160.
